entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain or snow near noon and ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:57 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 8:57 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
